data.actual_result: The last option or two in the server settings is off-screen
data.expected_result: The server settings should fully show
data.short_description: Off-screen options when right clicking on servers then server settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a long list of servers in your server list (goes past your screen and you must scroll down) - Create a new server or already have a server you have full access to - Move your server to 5th from bottom (only 4 channels below it) - Scroll all the way to the bottom of your server list - Right click on your server then hover over server settings
